column4: Anyone have any idea why a new 10.04 install would simply print the word GRUB and not boot?
boot to livecd, chroot to the install and upgrade the system
I booted into the server CD, used the real root (LVM lv) and used grub-install on it, but it still won't boot.
So a reinstall of GRUB did not fix it, any other guess?  Note I set up software RAID0 during the install then LVM on top of that.
